title: Apple Debuts $999 iPhone Air, Betting on Ultrathin Design
description: Apple Inc. introduced its thinnest-ever iPhone and new Pro versions with enhanced cameras and more battery life, betting that a flurry of smartphone innovation can entice shoppers this holiday season.

title: Oracle Shares Jump to Record on Cloud Infrastructure Outlook
description: Oracle Corp. shares surged to a record in extended trading after the company posted a significant increase in bookings and gave an aggressive outlook for its cloud infrastructure business.

title: Key Takeaways From the Apple iPhone 17 Event
description: A huge day for Apple in Cupertino. The company unveiled its new iPhone 17 lineup which includes the Air design. It also showed off new smartwatches and updated AirPods. Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, our Apple expert, has the key takeaways. (Source: Bloomberg)
